CustomField.description: Mode of Payment. 1. 'Electronic', whenever Payments/ Refunds are done via Payment Gateway. 2. 'External', whenever Payments/ Refunds are manually done with Cash/ Check Payment.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Mode of Payment. 1. 'Electronic', whenever Payments/ Refunds are done via Payment Gateway. 2. 'External', whenever Payments/ Refunds are manually done with Cash/ Check Payment.
CustomField.label: Payment Mode
